mapper.insert: insert into businessman(business_id, business_pass, business_name, business_company, business_hp, business_email) values(#{business_id},#{business_pass},#{business_name},#{business_company},#{business_hp},#{business_email})
mapper.select: select count(*) from businessman where business_id=#{business_id} and business_pass=#{business_pass}
select count(*) from businessman where business_id=#{business_id}
